description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Play Snooker, UK 8-ball, US 8-ball and 9-ball in single player, competition and multiplayer modes. With a fully 3D viewpoint, realistic physics, realtime ball reflections, aim assist, autosave and highscores. Find out more at pixelbitgames.webs.com and follow us on Twitter @pixelbitgames
